mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.forum_name as forumName ,a.xuesheng_id as xueshengId ,a.laoshi_id as laoshiId ,a.users_id as usersId ,a.forum_content as forumContent ,a.super_ids as superIds ,a.forum_types as forumTypes ,a.forum_state_types as forumStateTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,laoshi.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,laoshi.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,laoshi.laoshi_id_number as laoshiIdNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,laoshi.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail ,xuesheng.xuesheng_uuid_number as xueshengUuidNumber ,xuesheng.xuesheng_name as xueshengName ,xuesheng.xuesheng_phone as xueshengPhone ,xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number as xueshengIdNumber ,xuesheng.xuesheng_photo as xueshengPhoto ,xuesheng.yuanxi_types as yuanxiTypes ,xuesheng.banji_types as banjiTypes ,xuesheng.xuesheng_email as xueshengEmail ,users.username as uusername ,users.password as upassword ,users.role as urole ,users.addtime as uaddtime
FROM forum a left JOIN laoshi laoshi ON a.laoshi_id = laoshi.id left JOIN xuesheng xuesheng ON a.xuesheng_id = xuesheng.id left JOIN users users ON a.users_id = users.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.forum_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.forumName},'%')
and ( a.xuesheng_id = #{params.xueshengId} )
and ( a.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} )
and ( a.users_id = #{params.usersId} )
and a.forum_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.forumContent},'%')
and a.super_ids >= #{params.superIdsStart}
and a.super_ids <= #{params.superIdsEnd}
and a.super_ids = #{params.superIds}
and a.forum_types = #{params.forumTypes}
and a.forum_state_types = #{params.forumStateTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.laoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and laoshi.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiIdNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
and a.xuesheng_id IS NOT NULL
and xuesheng.xuesheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengUuidNumber},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengName},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengPhone},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengIdNumber},'%')
and xuesheng.yuanxi_types = #{params.yuanxiTypes}
and xuesheng.banji_types = #{params.banjiTypes}
and xuesheng.xuesheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengEmail},'%')
and a.users_id IS NOT NULL
and users.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and users.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and users.role like CONCAT('%',#{params.role},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(users.addtime) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.addtimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(users.addtime) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.addtimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
